content: Good evening! How can I assist you today?
Explain briefly the company and what it aims to achieve.
BlueThistle AI aims to empower businesses with AI-powered chatbots and automation solutions to enhance efficiency and improve customer service. The company is based in Scotland and operates remotely.
What roles do the employees of your company fulfill?

The roles fulfilled by employees at BlueThistle AI are diverse and cover areas like AI chatbot development, automation analytics, business process automation, NLP solutions, and more. Feel free to ask for more specific details on any of these roles.
Does your company have many employees?

I'm currently unable to find specific details on the number of employees at BlueThistle AI. However, the company covers various roles related to AI chatbot development, automation analytics, and more. If you need more information, feel free to ask.
